src_original: tādṛśāni ca sthānāni āśrayet /  yeṣu ca sthāneṣu nâtidūre piṇḍapātagocaro bhavati na  atisaṃnikṛṣṭe /  yeṣu pānīyāni bhavanty acchāni śucīni nirmalāny alpâyāsāni mukhaparibhogāni yā-
tgt_original: 常樂乞食，往返不近、不遠，近清淨水，不污、不濁；

src_original: ni ca sthānāni vṛkṣasaṃpannāni bhavanti puṣpasaṃpannāni phalasaṃpannāni pattrasaṃpannāny
tgt_original: 多諸林樹，無恐怖處，花果具足；

src_original: apagataduṣṭaśvāpadāni guhāsaṃpannāni prāgbhārasaṃpannāni sukhaparisarpyakāṇi śāntāny  advitīyāni tādṛśāni sthānāny āśrayet /
tgt_original: 遠離惡獸，多諸龕窟，往返不難，寂靜第一。

src_original: sa teṣu sthāneṣv āśrito yad anena pūrvapaṭhitaṃ bhavati tat tribhī rātrais trirdivasasya  svâdhyāyati nâtyuccena svareṇa nâtinīcena nôddhatair indriyair na bahirgatena cittena  prasādam upajīvan grantham upadhārayan nimittāny udgṛhṇan middham apakrāman /
tgt_original: 「菩薩如此處，晝誦三遍、夜亦三遍，聲不高下，善守諸根，心不散亂，深信歡喜，能憶偈句，善取因相，除去睡眠。

src_original: saced āraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vôpasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vânye vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadāḥ /  tena teṣām ādareṇa svāgatakriyā kartavyā /  evaṃ cânena vaktavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 「王、若王等、若諸王子、婆羅門、剎利及餘人民往至菩薩阿練若處，比丘唱言：

src_original: saced upaviśati dvābhyām apy upaveṣṭavyaṃ /  sacen nôpaviśati ubhābhyām api nôpaveṣṭavyaṃ /
